The '''Tolkien Society of America''' was the first American [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]].

==History==
The Society was founded by [[Dick Plotz]] and several others at Columbia University in February [[1965]]. Two years later, [[Edward Meskys]] took over. In [[1972]], it was merged with the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

The society published two journals, ''[[Green Dragon (journal)|Green Dragon]]'' and the ''[[Tolkien Journal]]''.
